title: No Guitar Hero Controller? How to Use a PS2 Controller Instead

steps.title: Press the correct button at the time the notes come.
steps.content: Press the correct button at the time the notes come. Instead of pressing the frets and pushing the strum bar, you just press the appropriate button for the note.

steps.title: Note that the keys are:
steps.content: Note that the keys are: Green: L2 Red: L1 Yellow: R1 Blue: R2 Orange: X/A Up/Down: Directional Keys Select: X/A Star Power: SELECT Start: START Whammy: Left Analog Stick up.
